inclusion.criterion: Better nourished (weight for age > 60 NCHS median)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: H/o. diarrhea of less than 48 hours
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent from either parents/guardian (thumb impression for those who are not literate) for children
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Negative test results for dark field microscopy of Vibrio cholerae and ELISA test for rotavirus in initial stool samples
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling to comply with study procedures
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Currently participating or have participated in another clinical trial within the last 4 weeks at screening
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant abnormalities from medical history, physical examination, vital signs, haematology, clinical chemistry results, or other laboratory abnormalities
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has profuse watery diarrhea without odor. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
